- My head is at **(7,6)**, opponent’s head chilling at **(7,9)**.  
- No bodies on the board yet, so I’m free to hop any direction without instant self‑crash.  
- The opponent can only move to **(7,8)**, **(6,9)** (apple!), or **(8,9)** – none of those squares line up with my immediate options. ✅  

Now, where’s the juiciest apple? 🍎  
- **(8,6)** is just ONE step to the right. 🎯  
- All other apples are farther (minimum distance 2).  

Snagging that apple scores me **+1** and gives me a length‑2 tail, putting me ahead in the race and letting me start boxing the rival. 🚀  

What about a head‑on? The opponent can’t jump to (8,6) in a single move, so the collision risk is ZERO.  

So the smartest, most aggressive, apple‑getting move is a quick dash to the right. Let’s grab it!  

**RIGHT**
